statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -4 \\ 6 \\ -8 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 8 \\ -2 \\ 6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
